MR4 Free For All #1: RECAP
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Coliseum (Public Monster Rancher Tournaments): Legend Cup! Archive: MR4 Tournaments: MR4 Free For All #1: RECAP
By Infernus on Sunday, April 4, 2004 - 03:53 pm:

In an event that promised to be...uneventful, there were actually a few decent rounds. Yes, 1 round was cool. Anyway, on to the recap. Lions and Tigers and Beatles and Big Rock Men, oh my!

FIGHT 1

Falconis VS. Punk

ROUND 1
Punk starts things off with a Wild Slash for 131 damage, he quickly hops to doing it again for another 137! Falconis becomes "SLOW"... Punk tosses in one more Wild Slash for 107 damage! KO

ROUND 2
Once again, Punk starts things off, this time with a Fire Kick for 196 damage. Once again, Falconis becomes "SLOW"! Punk takes advantage of this and delivers a 291 Super Claw. KO

ROUND 3
Punk loves kicking the crap out of Falconis it seems, and starts things off with another Fire Kick! Oh, and guess what? Falconis gets "SLOW"...again. Punk ends this quickly with a 291 Super Claw. KO

Winner: Punk/Sweep

FIGHT 2

Avalon VS. Withnail

ROUND 1
Woo, Backfist from Withnail! MISS! Bite from Avalon! 276! KO Fast, huh?

ROUND 2
Um...man, this is harsh. Bite from Avalon, 262 damage. KO

ROUND 3
Withnail decides to put up a fight in this round! He starts things off with a Beabrate! Avalon counters and MISSES! 23 damage and -19 guts! Avalon then shows Withnail who's boss with a 163 Charge. Then he does it again, Withnail tries to counter and fails, and Avalon gets the 191 CRITICAL KO

Winner: Avalon/Sweep

FIGHT 3

Punk VS. Withnail

ROUND 1
Punk: Fire Kick, 166. Punk: Super Claw, 156. KO Nuff' said.

ROUND 2
Punk starts things off with a Fire Kick for 166. Withnail becomes "SLOW", but still manages an Upper Charge for 340 (Go Withnail!). Then he tries another shot with Back Fist, and misses.Punk shows him how it's done with a 168 Super Claw. KO

ROUND 3
Woo, Withnail uses Upper Charge! Wooo...miss. Golden Arm from Punk! COUNTER! No good though, 175 damage against Withnail. Toss in another 71 Wild Slash from Punk, and this one is OVA. KO

Winner: Punk/Sweep

FIGHT 4

Avalon VS. Falconis

ROUND 1
This is the only fight worth recapping in this set...
Spin Punch from Falconis! Miss (no surprise)! Avalon Somersaults for 226, then again for a CRITICAL 478. KO

Round 2
Combo from Avalon. 484 CRITICAL KO

ROUND 3
There's a whole lot of ROUND 2 in here, only more so.
Combo from Avalon. 726 CRITICAL KO

Winner: Avalon/Sweep

FIGHT 5

Falconis VS. Withnail

ROUND 1
Atomic Punch from Falconis...303 damage! KO

ROUND 2
Atomic Punch from Falconis...again. We knew what happened once Fen uttered a simple "Splat". KO

ROUND 3
In a reverse of roles, Withnail pulls it off bigtime! 429 Bearocket! KO

ROUND 4...round 4?
Repeat rounds one and two. KO

Winner: Falconis/3-1

FIGHT 6

Avalon VS. Punk

ROUND 1
The first match of the winners, and there's not much to say. Combo from Avalon, 540 KO

ROUND 2
Best. Match. Evar.
Punk starts things off with a Fire Kick! MISS! Avalon "bites" back with a...Bite! Punk COUNTERS, and it HITS for 263 damage! Punk tries to win it with a Super Claw, but it misses. Avalon Bites, Punk COUNTERS and misses, and pays the price for it. An exact cost of 315 damage. Punk tries again with a Wild Slash, and misses again. Avalon would finish him off with a 327 Bite. KO

ROUND 3
See round one. KO

Winner: Avalon/Sweep

Final Standings
Avalon: 3-0 (1st)
Punk: 2-1 (2nd)
Falconis: 1-2 (3rd)
Withnail: 0-3 (4th)

Thank you, and good afternoon! More Avalon, less Withnail!

All hail BloodLuvinGirl!
